g.text: Int. J. Environ. Res. Public Health
Comparisons of coal mine type, geological condition, mitigation, and monitoring of coal dust among China, the USA, and Australia. NIOSH: National
Institute for Occupational Safety and Health, NSW: New South Wales, QLD: Queensland.
Category Countries China The USA Australia
Slowly inclined or near horizontal coal seam
Less structural damage such as faults, folds,
shovel operations, or a combination of
shovel operations, or a combination of
sprays, ranging armsprays, etc.) and other
sprays, ranging armsprays, etc.) and other
